Package com.sony.smarttennissensor.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHost
    IHost is the interface offerred by the Host App.
    ILiveModeListener
    Callback to clients when the sensor is in LiveMode.
    IOnConfigChangeListener  
    IOnSensorChangeListener  
    IOnSensorStateChangeListener
    Callback when the sensor state changes:
    IResultListener
    Callback for the result of IHost.setConfig(Config, IResultListener, IOnConfigChangeListener)

    0 = SUCCESS
    -1 = NETWORK_ERROR
    -2 = If the host is not in CONNECTED state
    ISensorConnectListener
    This callback will receive the result of com.sony.smarttennissensor.service.IHost#connect()
